description:
The Staff Human Resources Supervisor is responsible for supervising staff and managing, coordinating and/or evaluating HR services, policies, and programs for the Department of Neurology. Specific areas of responsibility include Staffing and Recruitment, Employee/Labor Relations, Personnel Administration, Leave Coordination, Benefits, HR Compliance, and Payroll Management. The HR Supervisor serves as a consultant and point of expertise to Managers, PI’s and department leadership on human resources issues. The HR Supervisor assesses and anticipates HR-related needs and communicates proactively with department leadership and central HR.

Salary Range: $92600 - $202200
